a = ["cat","dog","panda"]
print(a)
b= input("ur animal: ")
print(b.capitalize())
if b in a:
    v = f" ur chosen animal is {b}"
    v.capitalize()
    print(v)
else:
    print(f" Not on the list: {b}.")
    print("enetr again: ")
    c = input("ur animal is")
    print(c.capitalize())
    if c in a:
        print(f"u have the correct choice: ")
        print("Congratulation! ")
    else:
        print("Enter tommorrow please.ğŸ˜”")
